item.title: Issues with Main Bubble Cluster
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Critical Outage Detected on Main Bubble Cluster

Our automated systems report potential issues with the main Bubble cluster and are currently investigating the root cause of the outage.

Mar 4, 21:11 EST
Resolved - Our automated systems report that they were able to successfully restore service to normal. We are investigating the root cause of the outage.

Mar 4, 21:04 EST
Investigating - Our automated systems have detected potential issues with the main Bubble cluster. We are currently investigating...

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Issues with Main Bubble Cluster
item.content:encoded:
[High] - API Workflow Failure Investigation

Summary: Scheduled API workflows are not running to completion, causing a major impact on system functionality.

Feb 25, 15:36 EST
Investigating - We are investigating reports of scheduled API workflows not running to completion.

item.content:encoded:
Feb 7, 06:41 EST
Resolved - Our automated systems report that they were able to successfully restore service to normal. We are investigating the root cause of the outage.

Feb 7, 06:30 EST
Identified - We have identified the root cause as being specific to one shard of our database. User applications belonging on that shard may be inaccessible. We are currently beginning remediation.

item.title: Issues with Main Bubble Cluster
item.content:encoded:
Jan 23, 07:58 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 22, 21:21 EST
Update - We are continuing to catch up on the backlog of data triggers and other scheduled activity. We are currently estimating that we will be fully caught up around 4:30 am ET

Jan 22, 18:47 EST
Monitoring - We've fixed the problem and delayed data triggers and editor actions are beginning to run. Some of bubble.io's scheduled workflows were also delayed, so automated emails related to your account and other related things may be delayed. We're continuing to monitor the situation

Jan 22, 16:59 EST
Identified - Some data triggers (especially in situations where many data triggers are kicked off by the same modifications) are currently delayed; they will run eventually. There are also some editor operations that are currently delayed, such as capacity warning emails, database copy and restore on larger databases, and cancelling large number of scheduled tasks. We have identified a fix and will be unblocking all of these shortly.

Jan 22, 16:41 EST
Investigating - Our automated systems have detected potential issues with the main Bubble cluster. We are currently investigating...

item.title: Slow performance across main cluster and dedicated
item.content:encoded:
Jan 8, 14:07 EST
Resolved - We believe the incident was caused by this CloudFlare issue: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/0lr96pfk333t

We are working with the CloudFlare team to confirm. At this time, we believe our customers are no longer affected

Jan 8, 13:20 EST
Monitoring - Systems are recovered; we are still investigating what happened, but believe this was a transient networking or CDN issue

Jan 8, 13:06 EST
Investigating - We are seeing very slow page load times on both main cluster and dedicated, and are investigating

item.title: Issues with Main Bubble Cluster
item.content:encoded:

Resolved - Our automated systems report that they were able to successfully restore service to normal. We are investigating the root cause of the outage.
